translations.name: Portuguese European Version Bible
translations.description: This Biblica translation of the Portuguese Bible is for the Portuguese language, which is primarily used in Portugal. An estimated 170 million people speak this language as their mother tongue. This translation uses an informal language style and applies a meaning-based translation philosophy. It was translated from the biblical languages and was completed in October 2000.
